description: Enjoy woodland, meadows, ponds and a community orchard in this 67 acre country park in Leicester. There are a number of well laid out footpaths to follow and a visitor centre with a cafe. The park is located between Oadby and Wigston. On the site there's some interesting sculptures and handy information boards which tell you all about the flora and fauna you can see here. Look out for a variety of butterflies around the meadows and several species of woodland bird.
